CustomField.description: The default timeout value in hours for unified cases preferred agent expiry. This value is used for unified cases if no routing rule is matched. If matching routing rule is found the preferred agent timeout configured in the matching routing rule is used.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The default timeout value in hours for unified cases preferred agent expiry. This value is used for unified cases if no routing rule is matched.
CustomField.label: Unified Preferred Agent Expiry(in Hours)
